Themes / Letting Go of Control
Recovery Theme

Letting Go of Control

Recognizing the many ways we try to manage, fix, or manipulate outcomes.

We managed, we orchestrated, we worried ourselves sick trying to control outcomes that were never ours to control. The need to control is the disease talking through us.

These readings explore the subtle and not-so-subtle ways we try to run other people’s lives — and what happens when we finally put that burden down.

Related Tags in This Theme

Readings tagged with these topics appear on this page.

Control 1 Flexibility 1 Willingness 4 Self-will 1

Recovery Tools

  • Pause before offering advice
  • Let someone make their own mistake
  • Write a "letting go" letter
  • Practice "Let Go and Let God"
